ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen significant activity with multiple pull requests focused on improving volume control and editor functionality. Recent updates include fixing volume adjust key repeat, adding a global volume adjust binding, and restoring volume control to the editor. These changes aim to address user expectations and improve compatibility with other global actions.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has received updates to the Spanish translation of game modifier mods, with two pull requests covering 22 mods in total. These changes are part of the ongoing effort to update outdated translations according to the osu-wiki status in Spanish, and have been tested against the contribution checklist.

ppy/osu-tools.summary: The osu-tools repository has been updated with a new option to populate score parameters on the SimulateScreen using a score ID. This feature aims to enhance the simulation capabilities of the tool, and has been merged through a pull request.
